hero.title: Professional Project Management Across Industries
hero.subtitle: Process optimization, team leadership, and delivering efficient results across IT, Construction, Marketing, Finance, and more.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Hello, I’m {{name}}, a Civil Engineer specialized in Project Management with a passion for driving innovation and efficiency across diverse industries.
about.paragraph2: Over the years, I have developed extensive experience leading complex projects not only in construction, but also in fields like IT, marketing, financial services, and education. I specialize in implementing process automation and delivering data-driven visual insights using tools such as Power BI and Power Apps. My goal is to optimize workflows, improve decision-making, and drive measurable results — regardless of the industry.
about.paragraph3: I founded {{name}} with the vision of helping companies optimize their processes, improve team collaboration, and achieve measurable results through structured and effective project management methodologies.
about.paragraph4: I am committed to continuous learning and staying updated with the latest technologies and industry trends to provide innovative solutions tailored to each client’s unique needs.

projectManagement.title: Project Management Across Industries
projectManagement.description: Offering tailored project management solutions for IT, Construction, Marketing, Financial Consulting, and Education sectors. I ensure projects are delivered on time, within budget, and aligned with business objectives.

automation.title: Process Automation and Optimization
automation.description: Designing and implementing workflows, automations, and decision trees that optimize operations and reduce manual effort, using tools like Power BI, Power Apps, and Power Automate.

teamLeadership.title: Team Leadership and Collaboration
teamLeadership.description: Managing multidisciplinary teams, coordinating internal and external developers, and fostering clear communication among stakeholders to ensure project success.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting and Integration
consulting.description: Recommending technology solutions and integrating APIs, platforms, and tools that fit project requirements, balancing technical feasibility with business objectives.

tools.title: Tools We Use
tools.subtitle: A modern stack to optimize project management, development and design.
